Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2007 01:29PM mk24 wrote: Since being on tamoxifen 3 1/2 years, had problems with bleeding and discomfort. Removed both ovaries (has cyst on one) and a year later endo biopsy, followed by d&c (had large polyps-ALL BENIGN! Been fine for over a year now. Good Luck, it does happen.
